directions: Toss the cucumbers with the salt in a colander, and leave in the sink to drain for 30 minutes. Rinse with cold water, then drain and pat dry with paper towels.

Whisk together the sugar and vinegar in a mixing bowl until the sugar has dissolved. Add the cucumbers, jalapeno peppers, and cilantro; toss to combine. Sprinkle chopped peanuts on top before serving.
ingredients: 3 large cucumbers, peeled, halved lengthwise, seeded, and cut into 1/4-inch slices
title: Thai Cucumber Salad
